recipes.title: Classic Spaghetti Bolognese
recipes.description: A rich and hearty Italian meat sauce served over pasta

instructions.text: Heat olive oil in a large pan over medium-high heat.
Add diced onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
Add ground beef and brown, breaking it up with a spoon.
Add minced garlic and cook for 1 minute.
Stir in diced tomatoes, tomato paste, and seasonings.
Simmer for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Meanwhile, cook spaghetti according to package directions.
Serve sauce over pasta and top with parmesan cheese.

recipes.title: Chicken Stir-Fry
recipes.description: Quick and healthy chicken stir-fry with colorful vegetables

instructions.text: Cut chicken into bite-sized pieces and slice vegetables.
Cook rice according to package directions.
Heat vegetable oil in a wok or large skillet over high heat.
Stir-fry chicken until cooked through, about 5-6 minutes. Remove.
Add more oil if needed, stir-fry vegetables for 3-4 minutes.
Add garlic and ginger, cook 30 seconds.
Return chicken, add soy sauce and sesame oil.
Serve over rice.

recipes.title: Classic Beef Tacos
recipes.description: Seasoned ground beef tacos with fresh toppings

instructions.text: Brown ground beef with diced onion in a skillet.
Drain excess fat, add taco seasoning and a little water.
Simmer for 5 minutes until sauce thickens.
Warm tortillas in a dry skillet or microwave.
Prepare toppings: shred lettuce, dice tomatoes, shred cheese.
Assemble tacos with meat and desired toppings.

recipes.title: Garlic Butter Shrimp Pasta
recipes.description: Succulent shrimp in a rich garlic butter sauce over pasta

instructions.text: Cook pasta according to package directions, reserve 1 cup pasta water.
Melt butter in a large skillet over medium heat.
Add minced garlic and red pepper flakes, cook 1 minute.
Add shrimp and cook until pink, about 2-3 minutes per side.
Squeeze lemon juice over shrimp.
Toss with drained pasta, adding pasta water if needed.
Garnish with parsley and parmesan.

recipes.title: Classic Chicken Caesar Salad
recipes.description: Crispy romaine with grilled chicken and creamy caesar dressing

instructions.text: Season chicken with salt and pepper, grill until cooked through.
Make croutons by toasting breadcrumbs with olive oil and garlic.
Mix mayo, lemon juice, minced garlic, and parmesan for dressing.
Chop romaine lettuce and place in a large bowl.
Slice grilled chicken and arrange on top.
Drizzle with dressing and top with croutons and extra parmesan.

recipes.title: Vegetable Curry
recipes.description: Creamy coconut curry loaded with vegetables

instructions.text: Dice potatoes and cut bell pepper into chunks.
Heat oil and sauté onion, garlic, and ginger until fragrant.
Add curry powder and garam masala, cook 1 minute.
Add potatoes and coconut milk, simmer 15 minutes.
Add chickpeas and bell pepper, cook 5 more minutes.
Stir in spinach until wilted.
Serve over rice.

recipes.title: Classic Cheeseburgers
recipes.description: Juicy homemade beef burgers with melted cheese

instructions.text: Mix ground beef with salt, pepper, and garlic powder.
Form into 4 patties, slightly larger than your buns.
Heat a grill or skillet over medium-high heat.
Cook patties 4-5 minutes per side for medium.
Add cheese slices in last minute to melt.
Toast buns and assemble with desired toppings.

recipes.title: Honey Garlic Salmon
recipes.description: Pan-seared salmon with a sweet and savory glaze

instructions.text: Mix honey, soy sauce, and minced garlic in a small bowl.
Season salmon with salt and pepper.
Heat butter in a skillet over medium-high heat.
Cook salmon skin-side up for 4 minutes.
Flip and pour honey garlic sauce over the top.
Cook another 4 minutes, spooning sauce over fish.
Serve with lemon wedges.

recipes.title: Creamy Tomato Soup
recipes.description: Velvety smooth tomato soup perfect for dipping

instructions.text: Melt butter and sauté onion until soft.
Add garlic and cook 1 minute.
Add tomatoes, broth, basil, and sugar.
Simmer for 20 minutes.
Blend until smooth with an immersion blender.
Stir in heavy cream and season to taste.

recipes.title: Fried Rice
recipes.description: Restaurant-style fried rice with eggs and vegetables

instructions.text: Use day-old cold rice for best results.
Heat oil in a wok over high heat.
Scramble eggs and set aside.
Stir-fry diced vegetables for 2-3 minutes.
Add rice and stir-fry, breaking up clumps.
Add soy sauce and toss to coat evenly.
Return eggs, add sesame oil, and serve.

recipes.title: Baked Pork Chops
recipes.description: Tender juicy pork chops with a crispy coating

instructions.text: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
Mix breadcrumbs, parmesan, and seasonings.
Beat egg in a shallow dish.
Dip pork chops in egg, then coat with breadcrumb mixture.
Place on a baking sheet and drizzle with olive oil.
Bake 20-25 minutes until internal temp reaches 145°F.

recipes.title: Black Bean Burritos
recipes.description: Hearty vegetarian burritos packed with flavor

instructions.text: Cook rice according to package directions.
Heat black beans with cumin and chili powder.
Warm tortillas in a dry pan or microwave.
Layer rice, beans, cheese, and salsa in center of each tortilla.
Add sour cream and sliced avocado if using.
Fold in sides and roll up tightly.

recipes.title: Creamy Mushroom Pasta
recipes.description: Rich and creamy pasta with sautéed mushrooms

instructions.text: Cook pasta according to package directions.
Slice mushrooms and mince garlic.
Melt butter and sauté mushrooms until golden.
Add garlic and thyme, cook 1 minute.
Pour in cream and simmer until slightly thickened.
Stir in parmesan and toss with drained pasta.

recipes.title: Sheet Pan Chicken Fajitas
recipes.description: Easy one-pan fajitas with colorful peppers

instructions.text: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
Slice chicken and peppers into strips.
Toss with oil, cumin, chili powder, and paprika.
Spread on a sheet pan in a single layer.
Roast 20-25 minutes until chicken is cooked through.
Squeeze lime juice over top and serve with warm tortillas.

recipes.title: Simple Oven-Roasted Vegetables
recipes.description: Caramelized mixed vegetables as a perfect side dish

instructions.text: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C).
Cut all vegetables into similar-sized pieces.
Toss with olive oil and seasonings.
Spread in a single layer on a sheet pan.
Roast 25-30 minutes, stirring halfway through.

recipes.title: Bacon and Eggs Breakfast
recipes.description: Classic American breakfast with crispy bacon

instructions.text: Cook bacon in a skillet until crispy, about 8 minutes.
Remove bacon and drain on paper towels.
Pour off most bacon fat, leaving a thin layer.
Fry eggs in the bacon fat to your preference.
Season with salt and pepper, serve with toast if desired.

recipes.title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
recipes.description: Golden crispy grilled cheese sandwich

instructions.text: Butter one side of each bread slice.
Place cheese between two slices, butter side out.
Cook in a skillet over medium heat.
Flip when golden brown, about 3-4 minutes per side.
Cut diagonally and serve hot.

recipes.title: One-Pot Chili
recipes.description: Hearty beef and bean chili with warming spices

instructions.text: Brown ground beef with onion in a large pot.
Add garlic and bell pepper, cook 2 minutes.
Stir in chili powder, cumin, and paprika.
Add tomatoes, tomato paste, beans, and broth.
Simmer uncovered for 30-45 minutes.
Serve topped with shredded cheese.

recipes.title: Banana Pancakes
recipes.description: Fluffy pancakes with natural banana sweetness

instructions.text: Mash bananas in a large bowl.
Mix in eggs, milk, melted butter, and vanilla.
Add flour, baking powder, and sugar. Mix until just combined.
Heat a griddle or pan over medium heat, lightly grease.
Pour 1/4 cup batter per pancake.
Flip when bubbles form on surface.
Serve with honey or maple syrup.

recipes.title: Greek Salad
recipes.description: Fresh Mediterranean salad with feta and olives

instructions.text: Chop cucumber, tomatoes, and bell pepper into chunks.
Thinly slice red onion.
Combine vegetables in a large bowl.
Whisk olive oil, vinegar, oregano, salt, and pepper.
Pour dressing over salad and toss.
Top with feta cheese and olives if desired.

recipes.title: Teriyaki Chicken Bowl
recipes.description: Sweet and savory glazed chicken over rice

instructions.text: Mix soy sauce, honey, garlic, and ginger for teriyaki sauce.
Cook rice according to package directions.
Cut chicken into bite-sized pieces.
Cook chicken in a pan until browned.
Add sauce and simmer until thickened.
Serve over rice with steamed broccoli.

recipes.title: Caprese Salad
recipes.description: Simple Italian salad with fresh mozzarella and tomatoes

instructions.text: Slice tomatoes and mozzarella into rounds.
Arrange alternating on a plate.
Tuck basil leaves between slices.
Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic.
Season with salt and serve.

recipes.title: Beef Stroganoff
recipes.description: Tender beef in a creamy mushroom sauce

instructions.text: Slice beef into thin strips.
Brown beef in butter, remove and set aside.
Sauté mushrooms and onions until golden.
Add broth and paprika, simmer 10 minutes.
Stir in sour cream and return beef.
Serve over egg noodles.

recipes.title: Quesadillas
recipes.description: Crispy tortillas filled with melted cheese

instructions.text: Place tortilla in a dry skillet over medium heat.
Sprinkle cheese on half the tortilla.
Add chicken if using.
Fold tortilla in half and press down.
Cook until golden, flip and repeat.
Serve with salsa and sour cream.

recipes.title: Pasta Primavera
recipes.description: Light pasta loaded with spring vegetables

instructions.text: Cook pasta according to package directions.
Dice all vegetables.
Sauté vegetables in olive oil until tender.
Add garlic and Italian seasoning.
Toss with drained pasta.
Top with parmesan cheese.

recipes.title: Egg Fried Rice
recipes.description: Quick and simple fried rice with scrambled eggs

instructions.text: Heat oil in a wok over high heat.
Scramble eggs and set aside.
Add rice and stir-fry until heated.
Add soy sauce and toss.
Return eggs and add green onions.
Drizzle with sesame oil and serve.

recipes.title: BLT Sandwich
recipes.description: Classic bacon, lettuce, and tomato sandwich

instructions.text: Cook bacon until crispy.
Toast bread slices.
Spread mayo on toast.
Layer lettuce, tomato, and bacon.
Top with second slice and serve.

recipes.title: Vegetable Soup
recipes.description: Hearty homemade vegetable soup

instructions.text: Dice all vegetables into bite-sized pieces.
Sauté onion and celery in a large pot.
Add remaining vegetables and broth.
Add tomatoes and seasonings.
Simmer 25-30 minutes until vegetables are tender.

recipes.title: Chicken Parmesan
recipes.description: Breaded chicken topped with marinara and melted cheese

instructions.text: Pound chicken breasts to even thickness.
Mix breadcrumbs with parmesan.
Dip chicken in egg, then breadcrumb mixture.
Pan-fry until golden on both sides.
Top with marinara and mozzarella.
Bake at 400°F until cheese melts.

recipes.title: Mashed Potatoes
recipes.description: Creamy buttery mashed potatoes

instructions.text: Peel and cube potatoes.
Boil in salted water until tender.
Drain and return to pot.
Add butter and mash.
Stir in warm milk until creamy.
Season with salt and pepper.

recipes.title: Fish Tacos
recipes.description: Light and fresh fish tacos with slaw

instructions.text: Season fish with cumin and chili powder.
Grill or pan-fry fish until flaky.
Shred cabbage and toss with lime juice.
Warm tortillas.
Assemble tacos with fish and slaw.
Top with sour cream and extra lime.

recipes.title: Omelette
recipes.description: Fluffy classic French omelette

instructions.text: Beat eggs with salt and pepper.
Melt butter in a nonstick pan over medium heat.
Pour in eggs and let set slightly.
Gently push edges to center, tilting pan.
Add cheese when nearly set.
Fold and slide onto plate.

recipes.title: Pad Thai
recipes.description: Classic Thai stir-fried rice noodles

instructions.text: Soak rice noodles in warm water until softened.
Mix fish sauce, sugar, and lime juice for sauce.
Stir-fry shrimp and tofu, set aside.
Scramble eggs in the wok.
Add noodles and sauce, toss to coat.
Return protein and top with peanuts.

recipes.title: BBQ Pulled Pork
recipes.description: Tender slow-cooked pork in tangy BBQ sauce

instructions.text: Rub pork with paprika and garlic powder.
Place in slow cooker with onion and broth.
Cook on low for 8 hours.
Shred pork with two forks.
Mix with BBQ sauce.
Serve on buns.

recipes.title: Shakshuka
recipes.description: Eggs poached in spiced tomato sauce

instructions.text: Sauté onion and bell pepper until soft.
Add garlic, cumin, and paprika.
Pour in tomatoes and simmer 10 minutes.
Make wells and crack eggs into sauce.
Cover and cook until eggs are set.
Serve with crusty bread.

recipes.title: Chicken Alfredo
recipes.description: Creamy parmesan pasta with grilled chicken

instructions.text: Cook pasta according to package directions.
Season and grill chicken, then slice.
Melt butter, add garlic and cream.
Simmer and stir in parmesan until melted.
Toss pasta with sauce and top with chicken.

recipes.title: Beef Tacos
recipes.description: Seasoned ground beef in crispy taco shells

instructions.text: Brown ground beef and drain.
Add taco seasoning and water, simmer.
Warm taco shells.
Fill with meat and toppings.

recipes.title: Lemon Garlic Chicken
recipes.description: Bright and zesty pan-roasted chicken

instructions.text: Season chicken with salt and oregano.
Brown chicken in olive oil.
Add garlic and lemon juice.
Cover and cook until done.
Garnish with lemon slices.

recipes.title: Tuna Salad
recipes.description: Classic creamy tuna salad for sandwiches

instructions.text: Drain tuna and flake into a bowl.
Dice celery and onion finely.
Mix all ingredients together.
Season with lemon juice and pepper.
Serve on bread or lettuce.

recipes.title: French Toast
recipes.description: Golden crispy French toast for breakfast

instructions.text: Whisk eggs, milk, vanilla, and cinnamon.
Dip bread in mixture, coating both sides.
Cook in buttered pan until golden.
Flip and cook other side.
Serve with syrup or powdered sugar.

recipes.title: Shrimp Scampi
recipes.description: Garlicky shrimp in white wine butter sauce

instructions.text: Cook pasta, reserve pasta water.
Sauté garlic in butter.
Add shrimp and cook until pink.
Add lemon juice and pasta.
Toss with parsley and serve.

recipes.title: Minestrone Soup
recipes.description: Hearty Italian vegetable and bean soup

instructions.text: Sauté diced vegetables until softened.
Add broth and tomatoes, bring to boil.
Add beans and pasta.
Simmer until pasta is cooked.
Season and serve with parmesan.

recipes.title: Chicken Noodle Soup
recipes.description: Comforting homemade chicken soup

instructions.text: Simmer chicken in broth until cooked.
Remove chicken and shred.
Add vegetables to broth.
Add noodles and cook until tender.
Return chicken and serve.

recipes.title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
recipes.description: Bell peppers filled with rice and meat

instructions.text: Cut tops off peppers, remove seeds.
Cook rice and brown beef with onion.
Mix beef, rice, and half the tomatoes.
Stuff peppers and place in baking dish.
Top with remaining tomatoes.
Bake 35 minutes, add cheese and finish.

recipes.title: Spinach Artichoke Dip
recipes.description: Creamy baked spinach and artichoke appetizer

instructions.text: Chop spinach and artichokes.
Mix cream cheese, sour cream, and parmesan.
Fold in vegetables and garlic.
Transfer to baking dish.
Bake at 350°F until bubbly.

recipes.title: Beef and Broccoli
recipes.description: Chinese takeout classic at home

instructions.text: Slice beef thin against the grain.
Stir-fry beef over high heat, set aside.
Stir-fry broccoli until tender-crisp.
Add garlic, ginger, and soy sauce.
Return beef and serve over rice.

recipes.title: Mac and Cheese
recipes.description: Creamy homemade macaroni and cheese

instructions.text: Cook pasta and drain.
Make roux with butter and flour.
Gradually whisk in milk.
Stir in cheese until melted.
Combine with pasta and serve.

recipes.title: Pesto Pasta
recipes.description: Quick and fresh basil pesto pasta

instructions.text: Cook pasta according to package.
Reserve some pasta water.
Toss pasta with pesto and olive oil.
Add pasta water to loosen if needed.
Top with parmesan and tomatoes.

recipes.title: Korean Bibimbap
recipes.description: Mixed rice bowl with vegetables and egg

instructions.text: Cook rice and keep warm.
Sauté each vegetable separately.
Season beef with sesame oil and cook.
Fry eggs sunny-side up.
Arrange all over rice in bowls.
Serve with gochujang on the side.

recipes.title: Bruschetta
recipes.description: Toasted bread with fresh tomato topping

instructions.text: Dice tomatoes and chop basil.
Mix with olive oil and minced garlic.
Slice and toast baguette.
Rub toast with garlic.
Top with tomato mixture.
Drizzle with balsamic if desired.

recipes.title: Mushroom Risotto
recipes.description: Creamy Italian rice dish with savory mushrooms

instructions.text: Sauté mushrooms in butter until golden. Set aside.
Cook onion and garlic in same pan.
Add rice and toast for 2 minutes.
Add wine if using, stir until absorbed.
Add warm broth one ladle at a time, stirring constantly.
Fold in mushrooms and parmesan. Serve immediately.

recipes.title: Honey Garlic Salmon
recipes.description: Sweet and savory glazed salmon fillets

instructions.text: Season salmon with salt and pepper.
Sear salmon skin-side up in hot pan.
Flip and cook 3 more minutes.
Mix honey, soy sauce, and minced garlic.
Add butter and glaze to pan.
Baste salmon with glaze and serve.

recipes.title: Vegetable Curry
recipes.description: Aromatic Indian curry with mixed vegetables

instructions.text: Sauté onion and garlic until fragrant.
Add curry paste and cook 1 minute.
Add potatoes and cauliflower.
Pour in coconut milk and simmer 20 minutes.
Add bell pepper and cook 5 more minutes.
Serve over rice.

recipes.title: BBQ Pulled Pork
recipes.description: Slow-cooked tender pulled pork with tangy BBQ sauce

instructions.text: Rub pork with spices.
Place in slow cooker with sliced onion.
Add half the BBQ sauce.
Cook on low for 8 hours.
Shred pork and mix with remaining sauce.
Serve on buns.

recipes.title: Greek Salad
recipes.description: Fresh Mediterranean salad with feta and olives

instructions.text: Cut cucumber and tomatoes into chunks.
Slice red onion thinly.
Combine vegetables in a bowl.
Add olives and crumbled feta.
Drizzle with olive oil.
Sprinkle with oregano and serve.

recipes.title: Chicken Parmesan
recipes.description: Crispy breaded chicken topped with marinara and melted cheese

instructions.text: Pound chicken to even thickness.
Mix breadcrumbs with parmesan.
Dip chicken in egg, then breadcrumbs.
Pan-fry until golden.
Top with marinara and mozzarella.
Broil until cheese melts.

recipes.title: Fish Tacos
recipes.description: Light and fresh tacos with crispy fish and slaw

instructions.text: Season fish with cumin, salt, pepper.
Make slaw with shredded cabbage and lime mayo.
Pan-fry or grill fish until flaky.
Warm tortillas.
Assemble tacos with fish and slaw.
Squeeze lime over top and serve.

recipes.title: Beef Stroganoff
recipes.description: Tender beef in creamy mushroom sauce over egg noodles

instructions.text: Slice beef into thin strips.
Brown beef in hot pan, set aside.
Sauté mushrooms and onion in butter.
Return beef to pan.
Stir in sour cream and heat gently.
Serve over cooked egg noodles.

recipes.title: Shakshuka
recipes.description: Eggs poached in spiced tomato sauce

instructions.text: Sauté onion and pepper until soft.
Add garlic, cumin, and paprika.
Pour in tomatoes and simmer 10 minutes.
Make wells and crack in eggs.
Cover and cook until eggs set.
Serve with crusty bread.

recipes.title: Pork Chops with Apple
recipes.description: Pan-seared pork chops with caramelized apples

instructions.text: Season pork chops with salt and pepper.
Sear in hot pan until golden, set aside.
Add butter and sliced apples to pan.
Sprinkle with brown sugar and thyme.
Cook apples until caramelized.
Serve pork topped with apples.

recipes.title: Tom Yum Soup
recipes.description: Hot and sour Thai soup with shrimp

instructions.text: Bring broth to boil with bruised lemongrass.
Add mushrooms and cook 5 minutes.
Add shrimp and chili paste.
Season with fish sauce and lime juice.
Simmer until shrimp are pink.
Serve hot with cilantro.

recipes.title: Caprese Salad
recipes.description: Simple Italian salad with tomato, mozzarella, and basil

instructions.text: Slice tomatoes and mozzarella.
Arrange alternating on a platter.
Tuck basil leaves between slices.
Drizzle with olive oil.
Add balsamic glaze if desired.
Season with salt and pepper.

recipes.title: Beef and Broccoli
recipes.description: Classic Chinese takeout dish

instructions.text: Slice beef thin and toss with cornstarch.
Stir-fry beef in hot oil, set aside.
Stir-fry broccoli until bright green.
Add garlic and cook 30 seconds.
Return beef, add soy sauce and sesame oil.
Toss and serve over rice.

recipes.title: Spinach and Feta Stuffed Chicken
recipes.description: Juicy chicken breasts filled with spinach and feta

instructions.text: Sauté spinach with garlic until wilted.
Mix spinach with crumbled feta.
Cut pockets in chicken breasts.
Stuff with spinach mixture.
Season and pan-sear chicken.
Finish in oven at 375°F for 15 minutes.

recipes.title: Banana Bread
recipes.description: Moist and delicious quick bread

instructions.text: Preheat oven to 350°F. Grease loaf pan.
Mash bananas in a large bowl.
Mix in melted butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla.
Fold in flour and baking soda.
Pour into pan and bake 55-60 minutes.
Cool before slicing.

recipes.title: Lamb Gyros
recipes.description: Greek-style lamb with tzatziki in warm pita

instructions.text: Season lamb with cumin, oregano, garlic.
Form into patties and grill.
Make tzatziki with yogurt and grated cucumber.
Warm pita bread.
Slice lamb and assemble in pita.
Top with tzatziki and vegetables.

recipes.title: Vegetable Lo Mein
recipes.description: Chinese noodles stir-fried with vegetables

instructions.text: Cook noodles according to package.
Stir-fry vegetables in hot wok.
Add cooked noodles.
Pour in soy sauce and sesame oil.
Toss until combined.
Serve hot.

recipes.title: Chicken Tikka Masala
recipes.description: Creamy tomato-based curry with tender chicken

instructions.text: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices.
Grill or broil chicken pieces.
Sauté garlic and ginger in butter.
Add tomatoes and simmer.
Stir in cream and garam masala.
Add chicken and serve with rice.

recipes.title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipes.description: Classic homemade cookies with chocolate chips

instructions.text: Cream butter and sugars until fluffy.
Beat in eggs and vanilla.
Mix in flour, baking soda, salt.
Fold in chocolate chips.
Scoop onto baking sheets.
Bake at 375°F for 10-12 minutes.

recipes.title: Minestrone Soup
recipes.description: Hearty Italian vegetable soup with pasta

instructions.text: Sauté onion, carrot, celery in olive oil.
Add zucchini and cook 3 minutes.
Pour in broth and tomatoes.
Add beans and simmer 15 minutes.
Add pasta and cook until tender.
Season and serve with parmesan.

recipes.title: Egg Fried Rice
recipes.description: Quick and easy Asian-style fried rice

instructions.text: Scramble eggs in hot wok, set aside.
Add cold rice to wok and stir-fry.
Add peas and cook 2 minutes.
Return eggs to wok.
Season with soy sauce and sesame oil.
Top with green onions and serve.

recipes.title: Lemon Butter Tilapia
recipes.description: Light and flaky fish with lemon butter sauce

instructions.text: Season fish with salt and pepper.
Pan-fry fish 3 minutes per side.
Remove fish and add butter to pan.
Sauté garlic until fragrant.
Add lemon juice and parsley.
Pour sauce over fish and serve.

recipes.title: Black Bean Soup
recipes.description: Hearty and flavorful Latin American soup

instructions.text: Sauté onion and garlic.
Add cumin and cook 1 minute.
Add beans and broth, simmer 20 minutes.
Blend half the soup until smooth.
Stir in lime juice.
Serve with sour cream.

recipes.title: Teriyaki Chicken Bowl
recipes.description: Sweet and savory chicken over rice

instructions.text: Cook rice according to package.
Make teriyaki sauce with soy, honey, ginger.
Cook chicken in sauce until glazed.
Steam broccoli until tender.
Slice chicken and arrange over rice.
Add broccoli and garnish with sesame.

recipes.title: Creamy Tomato Soup
recipes.description: Velvety smooth tomato soup with a touch of cream

instructions.text: Sauté onion in butter until soft.
Add garlic and cook 1 minute.
Add tomatoes and simmer 15 minutes.
Blend until smooth.
Stir in cream and season.
Garnish with basil and serve.

recipes.title: Sausage and Peppers
recipes.description: Italian sausages with sautéed peppers and onions

instructions.text: Brown sausages in a large skillet.
Remove sausages and set aside.
Sauté peppers and onions until tender.
Add garlic and Italian seasoning.
Return sausages and cook through.
Serve on crusty bread or over pasta.

recipes.title: Mango Chicken Salad
recipes.description: Fresh tropical salad with grilled chicken

instructions.text: Season and grill chicken until cooked.
Let chicken rest, then slice.
Dice mango and slice onion.
Make dressing with lime juice and oil.
Toss greens with dressing.
Top with chicken and mango.

recipes.title: Vegetable Quesadillas
recipes.description: Cheesy tortillas filled with sautéed vegetables

instructions.text: Sauté peppers, onion, mushrooms.
Season vegetables with cumin and salt.
Place tortilla in dry pan.
Add cheese and vegetables to half.
Fold and cook until golden on both sides.
Serve with sour cream and salsa.
